trans-unit.source: Specifies the properties that are in a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adja meg a tulajdonságokat a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A StylusPointDescription specifies which properties are associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.
trans-unit.target: Egy styluspointdescription elem határozza meg, milyen tulajdonságok társított <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: For each property in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>, the StylusPointDescription contains a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> object which specifies constraints such as the minimum and maximum values of the property.
trans-unit.target: Minden egyes tulajdonság egy <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>, a styluspointdescription elem tartalmaz egy <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>objektumon, amelynek korlátozásokat, például a minimális és maximális értékek a tulajdonság határozza meg.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.HasProperty%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetPropertyInfo%2A> methods to check for these properties in the StylusPointDescription.
trans-unit.target: Használja a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.HasProperty%2A>és <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetPropertyInfo%2A>módszerek ezeket a tulajdonságokat a styluspointdescription elem a kereséséhez.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetPropertyInfo%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.HasProperty%2A>

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> must share the same StylusPointDescription.
trans-unit.target: Minden <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>objektumokat egy <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>az azonos styluspointdescription elem közös.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: If you try to add a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> that has a different StylusPointDescription, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Ha megpróbálja felvenni a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>való egy <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, amely egy másik styluspointdescription elem van, akkor egy kivételt fog jelezni.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that contains information for the properties <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett konstruktor létrehoz egy <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>, amely ismerteti a Tulajdonságok <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>, és <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> és a megadott osztály <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"> </xref> objektumok.

trans-unit.source: You must pass in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> objects for the properties, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>.
trans-unit.target: Át kell adnia a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>objektumok tulajdonságaiban, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>, és <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: A generic IEnumerable of type <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> that specifies the properties in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Általános IEnumerable típusú <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"> </xref> , amely megadja, hogy a tulajdonságok a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> objects are identical.
trans-unit.target: Visszaadja egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy a megadott <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> objektumok azonosak.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> objects are compatible if they contain the same <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> objects in the same order.
trans-unit.target: Két <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>objektumok kompatibilisek, ha azonos tartalmaznak <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>objektumok ugyanabban a sorrendben.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to check.
trans-unit.target: Az első <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> ellenőrzéséhez.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to check.
trans-unit.target: A második <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> ellenőrzéséhez.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> objects are identical; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> objektum azonos; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the intersection of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A megadott metszetét adja vissza <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> objektumok.

trans-unit.source: `StylusPointDescription1` and `stylusPointDescriptionPreserveInfo` may have a common property, yet the constraints specified in their respective <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> objects differ.
trans-unit.target: `StylusPointDescription1`és `stylusPointDescriptionPreserveInfo` előfordulhat, hogy rendelkezik egy általános tulajdonság esetében, de a korlátozást, valamint saját megadott <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>objektumok térnek el egymástól.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: If the constraints differ, the GetCommonDescription method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> from `stylusPointDescriptionPreserveInfo`.
trans-unit.target: A megkötések térnek el egymástól, ha az GetCommonDescription metódusnak a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>a `stylusPointDescriptionPreserveInfo`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to intersect.
trans-unit.target: Az első <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> az intersect.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to intersect.
trans-unit.target: A második <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> az intersect.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that contains the properties that are present if both of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> van jelen, ha mindkét tulajdonságokat tartalmazó, a megadott <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> objektumok.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> for the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"> </xref> a megadott tulajdonság.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> that specifies the property of the desired <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref> , amely megadja, hogy a kívánt tulajdonságának <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"> </xref> a megadott <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets all the properties of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Minden tulajdonságait olvassa be a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains all of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egy gyűjteményt, amely tartalmazza az összes a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"> </xref> objektumokat a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> has the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Adja vissza egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy az aktuális <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> rendelkezik a megadott tulajdonságot.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> to check for in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref> keresett a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> has the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> rendelkezik a megadott <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref>; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> is a subset of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adja vissza egy érték, amely azt jelzi, hogy az aktuális <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> a megadott részhalmaza <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> against which to check whether the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> is a subset.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> összevetendő ellenőrizze, hogy az aktuális <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> részhalmaza.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> is a subset of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha az aktuális <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> a megadott részhalmaza <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of properties in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A tulajdonságok száma lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: A tulajdonságok száma a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.
